data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Lunarstorm is the most popular web-community in sweden.
    WWW::Community::Lunarstorm is an easy to use oo-module for
    interaction with the community (read/write guestbook entries etc). I
    believe it may be usefull for the public, and therefor wish to
    register the namespace.

    Since the community is web-based, WWW:: seems like the most logical
    choice. I may write modules for other communties later on, therefor
    I find it usefull to have WWW::Community registered.
